Data were generated by **Virginia Turati** in Tariq Enver's lab.

Single cell mutation calling was perfomed by **Lucia Conde**.

Single cell WGS normalisation and segmentation was performed by **Chuling Ding**.

Initial bulk RNA-seq were analysed by **John Ambrose**.

Most analyses of the bulk and single cell RNA-seq data (including exploratory analyses) were performed by **Afonso Guerra**.

Some additional analyses were performed by **Chela James** and **Javier Herrero**.

Methylation data were processed ana analysed by **Simone Ecker** in Stephan Beck's lab.

Re-packaging and re-organisation of the code and data was performed by **Javier Herrero**.
